item.description:
New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association

UPCOMING MEETING:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NHREIA

Presents

Robyn Thompson


Wednesday night, October 10, 2007

(at the regular monthly meeting) AND

Saturday, October 13, 2007 ? All Day Seminar

Quality Inn/Wayfarer Convention Center, Bedford, NH

Register online at: www.NHREIA.com



Read to the end to:

Get YOUR ticket for FREE!


Robyn Thompson is the nation's leading expert in buying, renovating and selling single and multifamily homes for huge profits. Robyn has renovated and sold over 200 homes!!! Robyn will cover:

· Five Unique Profit Centers from Real Estate

· 11 sources of Motivated Sellers

· 13 Marketing Techniques to Find Killer Deals

· Types of Properties NOT to Buy

· Coordinating Contractors for Maximum Profits

· Employees vs. Handy Men vs. Independent Contractors

· Never Write More than Seven Checks to Renovate a Home

· Sources for Finding Quality Contractors

· Getting Money to Grow Your Income to $1,000,000 a Year

· Marketing Techniques to Sell Your Property Quickly

· Prescreening the Buyers Who Want Your Home

· Three Types of Mortgages to Cash-out Big Profits



Robyn has taught thousands of students how to achieve financial independence by investing in distressed properties. Robyn has made retailing homes a science and she knows every technique imaginable to locate profitable deals, renovate distressed properties at lightening speed, minimize holding costs, and qualify good credit buyers and expedite closings so you can collect a big check.



Don?t Miss these events!

Register by September 30 to receive ?Mature Grown Up Adults ? How to Control Your Contractor, Like a Dog on a Leash? by Robyn Thompson and Paul Esajian

October 10th - Wednesday monthly NHREIA meeting

Cost: Members ? Free, Visitors - $15.00

October 13th - All Day Seminar

Cost: Members who prepay before September 30th pay just $69.00

Visitors who prepay before September 30st pay just $69.00 (over $50 savings)

Where: Quality Inn/Wayfarer Convention Center, Bedford, NH



Register online at: www.NHREIA.com or call Bernadette at 603-434-0093



BRING A GUEST COUPON!



Sign up a Visitor for this event ? Not a member of NHREIA (Visitor pays full price)?

Get 50% off the price of YOUR ticket!

Sign up 2 or more Visitors for this event ? Not members of NHREIA (pay full price)

Get YOUR ticket for FREE!
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association October Meetup
